alert.note: Alert for McCurtain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 19 at 10:25AM CDT until March 20 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 25 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Arkansas, north central and northwest Louisiana, southeast Oklahoma and northeast Texas. * WHEN...From 9 PM Sunday to 9 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
